--- Topological Order ---
- Postgres (Tags: persistence)
- Redis (Tags: ephemeral)
- FastAPI (Tags: backend)
- React (Tags: frontend)
- Celery (Tags: backend)

--- Text Tree (Sinks to Sources) ---
React
└─ FastAPI
   ├─ Redis
   └─ Postgres
Celery
├─ Postgres
└─ FastAPI
   ├─ Redis
   └─ Postgres

--- Mermaid Definition ---
flowchart TD
Postgres --> Celery
Postgres --> FastAPI
Redis --> FastAPI
FastAPI --> Celery
FastAPI --> React
React
Celery

--- Graphviz DOT ---
digraph G {
    rankdir="LR";
    nodesep="0.5";
    node [shape="rounded", style="filled", fontname="Arial"];
    "Postgres" [label="Postgres", fillcolor="lightgrey"];
    "Postgres" -> "Celery";
    "Postgres" -> "FastAPI";
    "Redis" [label="Redis", fillcolor="lightgrey"];
    "Redis" -> "FastAPI";
    "FastAPI" [label="FastAPI", fillcolor="lightblue"];
    "FastAPI" -> "Celery";
    "FastAPI" -> "React";
    "React" [label="React", fillcolor="lightgreen"];
    "Celery" [label="Celery", fillcolor="lightblue"];
}
